name: Yoplait Source 0% Smooth Traditional Yogurt Vanilla 630 g

data.description: Yoplait Source 0% Smooth Traditional Yogurt is a deliciously creamy, 0% M.F. yogurt made with no added sugar. Free from fat and full of flavour, now you can enjoy wellness your way every day. Yoplait Source Yogurt makes for a great snack anytime or addition to your breakfast. Enjoy it in smoothies, or add some granola and fruit to make a tasty parfait. This traditional yogurt is a source of calcium and is perfect for the whole family to share. Yoplait Source 0% M.F. Smooth Traditional Yogurt contains one 630 g container of smooth traditional yogurt in total.

ingredients: Skim milk (skim milk, vitamin A palmitate, vitamin D3), Water, Whey proteins, Modified corn starch, Gelatin, Natural and artificial flavour, Pectin, Active bacterial culture, Lactic acid, Sucralose (14 mg per 115 g serving), Potassium sorbate, Tricalcium phosphate, *may contain Milk protein, Modified tapioca starch, Agar.
